headline: EMCOR Group, Inc. (EME) to Sell U.K. Unit for $255M, Sharpens Focus on U.S. Growth
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 12 Best Stocks to Own for Grandchildren. EMCOR Group, Inc. is one of them. EMCOR Group, Inc. headline: Is Emcor Group (EME) a Buy as Wall Street Analysts Look Optimistic?
summary: The average brokerage recommendation (ABR) for Emcor Group (EME) is equivalent to a Buy. The overly optimistic recommendations of Wall Street analysts make the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric questionable. So, is it worth buying the stock?
